padcms.kiosk.view

Interface BasicViewController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoverControlsComponent, GridViewController

    public interface BasicViewController
    Interface of BasicViewController specifies which method should be implemented in the specific View controllers to ensure appropriate display the GUI when user switches from one mode (for example, the gallery) to another (for example, grid).
